synopsis.text: Have you ever witnessed a whale soaring through the heavens, or snow cascading in the summertime? In a quaint town, where the mundane intertwines with the miraculous, a tale of wonder unfolds. Beneath the watchful eye of an aerial whale, Kuonji discovers an awe-inspiring and somewhat unsettling spectacle. While his companions seem unfazed, Kuonji finds himself navigating a world of peculiar friends and tantalizing escapades. From Nina, who flaunts her striped undergarments, to Sacchan, whose love for felines knows no bounds, and Allen, an enigmatic alien entity, Kuonji's life is filled with ecchi encounters and unusual experiences. Dive into the extraordinary world of Final Examination Kujira, a place where the impossible becomes possible, and miracles are an everyday occurrence. Based on a game by Circus, this anime invites you to embark on a thrilling journey of wonder and intrigue.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
